subject: Re:VAJ metric utility  (was:  [junit] Best Practice for Tests ?)
msgSnippet: From: Jason Rogers [...] ... on ... Would you be willing to publish such an utility. I think it might be usefull to the community. (At least I know _I_ wanted
messageBody:
From: Jason Rogers
[...]
>Well put! This is something I have often alluded to in my own company, but
>still eludes me frequently. For that reason I wrote a utility that
>integrates with VAJ to keep the metrics coming as far as what is tested and
>what is not. This is not a code coverage analysis; all it does is report
on
>which classes are tested and which are not, and of the ones that are - how
>much of their public interface is tested.

Would you be willing to publish such an utility. I think it might be usefull
to the community. (At least I know _I_ wanted to write something that list
which class has a TestClass written for and which don't). Your stuff looks
cool.

mathieu
